items.title: Issuetrak
items.sponsor_description: Issuetrak is a fast-paced, agile software company based in the Hampton Roads area of Virginia. We’ve got a 20-year track record of successfully developing issue-tracking and process management software for companies of all sizes. We’re stoked on innovation and we love data, and we’re harnessing the power of both to develop a next generation product. We are a customer-centric company with a dedicated vision of creating the most robust and versatile software solution for our clients. And, we aren’t afraid to take risks to make this happen.

items.title: Marathon Consulting
items.sponsor_description: Marathon Consulting is one of the fastest growing and most successful Information Technology Consulting firms in the Hampton Roads region. Our name, our growth, and public recognition are the results of our total commitment to our clients’ success. Over 95% of our revenue comes from referrals and repeat business. Therefore, commitment to client success is a full time job.

items.title: ETA
items.sponsor_description: Emerging Technology Advisors (ETA) was founded around the mission of assisting large enterprise organizations keep up with the constant change in the technology field. We provide a holistic approach to reinvent organizations by leveraging next generation innovations and concepts, which has worked tremendously for our clients. We do not just reimagine product lines or define corporate strategy - we work with your employees directly to re-ignite their desire to change the world. We are not people that that just talk about technology, we are actually the ones building, exploring, supporting, and, as needed, creating the emerging technology that will change the world.

items.title: Twilio
items.sponsor_description:
Twilio is a cloud communications platform for software developers to build, scale and operate real time communications in their software applications.

Twilio powers the future of business communications, enabling phones, VoIP, and messaging to be embedded into web, desktop, and mobile software. We take care of the messy telecom hardware and expose a globally available cloud API that developers can interact with intelligent & complex communications systems.

80|20 is a software agency that creates web and mobile applications and provides software consulting solutions for small and mid-sized businesses.

Clients hire 80|20 to solve complex business problems that otherwise shackle their businesses. Our Internet applications are often the core of our clients' businesses, are easy to use, and work great on phones, tablets and desktops.

items.title: Grow
items.sponsor_description: Grow is a digital agency with a passion for big ideas, little details, and a better approach to creating world-class interactive experiences.

items.title: Carry Logistics
items.sponsor_description:
Order fulfillment customized for simplicity.

Easy Integration:
From a simple email to integrated APIs with your current system, we create the easiest way for you to start fulfilling those orders.

Collaborative Processing:
Include everyone needed to satisfy your customer. Each party gets their own portal in the cloud to view only the orders they need to act on. Automatic notifications keep your employees on track and your customers up-to-date.

Automated Tracking:
Every transaction is recorded and available, so you can view the history, current status and next action of any order immediately.

items.title: Pardot Engineering
items.sponsor_description: This is the SaleForce logo-only sponsor.
